agent_purpose: Analyze historical F1 performance data including qualifying results, race positions, points, and track-specific trends
description: Historical F1 performance statistics and trends analysis

track_performance.track_name: Various (last 5 races: Jeddah, Melbourne, Shanghai, Miami, Imola)

driver_stats.recent_form: Consistently at the front, winning 3 out of the last 5 races, 2 second-place finishes. Flawless reliability and strong conversion from qualifying to race results.

track_performance.track_name: Various (last 5 races: Jeddah, Melbourne, Shanghai, Miami, Imola)

driver_stats.recent_form: Strong qualifying and race pace, 4 podiums in last 5 races, always finishing within top 4. Reliability much improved over prior seasons.

constructor_stats.development_trend: Maintained high performance; slightly closing gap to Ferrari in qualifying but continued race pace superiority and unmatched reliability.
Significantly improved year-over-year, especially in race execution, but still trailing Red Bull marginally in outright pace and tire management.
